Toothbrush with pressure sensors: A toothbrush with pressure sensors that alert users when they are brushing too hard. This could help prevent damage to the gums and teeth.
Toothbrush with UV sanitization: A toothbrush with a built-in UV sanitizer that kills bacteria and germs on the bristles. This could help prevent the buildup of bacteria in the mouth.
Toothbrush with smart connectivity: A toothbrush that connects to a smartphone app, allowing users to track their brushing habits, set reminders, and receive personalized brushing recommendations.

Toothbrush with replaceable brush heads: A toothbrush with interchangeable brush heads that can be easily replaced when worn out. This could help ensure effective brushing and prolong the toothbrush's lifespan.
Toothbrush with built-in toothpaste dispenser: A toothbrush with a built-in toothpaste dispenser that allows users to dispense the perfect amount of toothpaste without making a mess.
